TopicTitle: Jeb, Bill, and Bob Go to Eve and Back! 12Km/s D-V... Bunch of Hot Air!

Articles.Content:
I created a three launch system to send the three original Kerbonauts to Eve and back. Eve Project I is the interplanetary tug piloted by Bob. It is mostly Bobcat Industries Parts and has a habitat module for the journey. Eve Project II is the manned lander, made of Bobcat Industries and Hooligan Labs Parts. It uses four Cirrus Envelopes to gain almost 32Km of altitude before rocketing into Low Eve Orbit. The third launch vehicle is the Eve Project III refueling drone. Probably unnecessary, but it gives Bob something to do while Jeb and Bill float about the purple planet. I have included the highlights and full length playlists. Thanks for stopping by!

Andy
